resources.string: What do I need to do?
Quickly and easily control PC and Android remotely.

First, install the RemoteView Agent to the PC or Android to be controlled.\nOn a PC, go to rview.com, on an Android, search [remoteview] from Play Store.\n2. Launch and press Sign Up to get registered.

After installing the Agent, selet the PC/Android to control and enter the access ID/PW to connect.\n1. Log in to www.rview.com from the remote PC.\n2. From \'My Computers\', press Install Agent icon to install it.

Try Remoteview on Android, iOS, Windows / Mac PC.
1. Log in to the app.
2. Select the PC to connect from the list of remote PCs.
3. Enter the Access ID/PW to log in.
Do you want to end this process?

To change RemoteView language, device\'s language must be changed. Do you wish to go to language settings? \n\nRemoteView supports English, Korean , Japanese, Chinese (Simplified), and Chinese (Traditional).
Are you sure you want to delete?
Below is how to control the mouse
Do you want to log off the System?
Do you want to restart the System?
Do you want to shutdown the System?
Do you want to end the session?
Do you want to shut down the program?
Do you want to close the session?
Forcefully terminate current remote control session.\nContinue?
Power status on the remote PC has been checked.\nPower Status: %1$s
You have selected the option to turn on the remote PC.\nBIOS settings and other requirements must be properly configured on the remote side for a PC to be turned on.
Turn On command has been sent to All PCs.\nBIOS settings and other requirements must be properly configured on the remote side for a PC to be turned on.
Screen lock on the remote device has been requested.
The remote screen did not lock successfully. Others may view your screen.
You have entered wrong User ID or Password.
Current \"Android\" is not allowed to access. Please Retry it later
The request is already being processed.
Cannot connect. The remote client has been removed.
This device could not be connected. \nCheck device\'s power ON/OFF, network connectivity and agent log in status.
Possible to install the agent only though web with this ID.
Service period has expired. To continue the use of the service and access the PC, visit www.rview.com and extend the license for the slot.
You need to upgrade to the latest version
Company ID does not exist. Please check your ID again
You must change your membership to use it. Please change your membership in the homepage.
Change to new RemoteView member in the Homepage.
The remote computer will not turn on if the agent has not yet been installed or it\'s in the offline state.
Access from this IP or Mac address is not permitted.
Another user is remote controlling the device. Try again later.
You cannot use remote access service with the MAC address that you connected. Please contact the administrator.
The ID that you loged in is not allowed to use remote access service in mobile. Please contact the administrator.
Your account has been locked after failing to login. Contact the administrator
Agent cannot be accessed as current no. of agents exceeded the no. of purchased licenses (agents). \nContact the administrator.
Update available. Do you want to update now?
There is an update available. Please, update to use the service.
Account has been locked for %1$s min %2$s sec after 5 failed attempts. Retry after %1$s min %2$s sec or contact the account manager.
Account has been locked after 5 failed attempts. Contact the account manager to unlock it.
Failed to login for %1$s times. Login will be unavailble for %2$s min %3$s sec after 5 failed attempts.
Login is unavailable for %1$s min %2$s sec due to 5 failed attempts. Please contact the administrator.

Failed to login for %1$s times.
Login will be unavailable after 5 failed attempts.
Login is unavailable due to 5 failed attempts. Please contact the administrator.
There is no available RemoteWOL for check status of power.
The remote computer will not turn on if RemoteWOL does not exist.
Password will expire in %1$s days. \nFrom a PC browser, visit %2$s, log in and change the password.
Your password has expired. \nLog in to PC website (%1$s) and update the password.
Service is unavailable due to incorrect licensing. \nVerify your license information and try again.
Cannot connect. The remote client is not running.
Failed to sending data to session server.
Socket error occurred in communicating session server.
This user ID is already in use. Would you like to disconnect the other user and login?
Remote System failed to initiate process for control.
Failed to run process requested from Remote System.
Failed to kill process requested from Remote System.
Failed to get the process list of Remote System.
Failed to reset environment values of Agent.
Access form this IP or Mac address is not permitted.
Failed to get the current screen of Remote System.
Failed to get the system information of Remote System.
ID or password incorrect.\nPlease re-enter your ID and password

Currently , vPro power management features are not available.

To use vPro power management, there must be any other powered on PC in the same network.

Check the status of your PCs and try again.
Confirm vPro System status. command has been cancelled.
Proxy server and port number are required to log in. \nUncheck Use Proxy if proxy server is not in use. \nDo you want to change proxy settings?
Log in failed due to incorrect proxy information. \nDo you want to change proxy settings?
Rebooting in progress..\nafter few seconds press click `Refresh` to confirm the system status.
Booting in progress.\nAfter a few second, click `Refresh` to confirm the system status.
It is turning off.\nClick `Refresh` to confirm to the system status.
Fail to transfer. Same file exists.
Select files to download from remote explorer
Select files to upload from local explorer
You don\'t have permission to read. Please try again after checking
You don\'t have permission to write. Try again after checking
Not enough storage space. Try again after saving more space
File copied. Select the folder to paste in the mobile
File copied. Select the folder to paste in the Remote PC

Same file exists. Overwrite it?
File name: "%1$s"

Existing: %2$s
New: %3$s
The network connection has been lost. Please try again
File transfer is in process. Do you want to exit?
The current list view data does not exist
File transfer failed due to oversize (limit %1$s MB).

There is no registered device.



Follow the steps below to install the Agent.



* Installing Agent on the PC

1. Login to www.rview.com

2. Click "Add PC" on Remote PC tab menu.



* Installing Agent on the Android

1. Download and install the RemoteView app on the mobile device.

2. Launch the app and login to complete the configuration.

There is no registered device.



Follow the steps below to install the Agent.



* Installing Agent on the PC

1. Login to www.rview.com

2. Click "Add PC" on Remote PC tab menu.



* Installing Agent on the Android

1. Download and install the RemoteView app on the mobile device.

2. Launch the app and login to complete the configuration.

There is no registered device.



Follow the steps below to install the Agent.



* Installing Agent on the PC

1. Login to www.rview.com

2. Click "Add PC" on Remote PC tab menu.



* Installing Agent on the Android

1. Download and install the RemoteView app on the mobile device.

2. Launch the app and login to complete the configuration.
Please wait.\nLonger than usual loading time can be experienced depending on the network condition.
Quick tap on non-virtual mouse area for left-click and circle icon for right-click.
Touch the screen briefly with two fingers.
Scroll the wheel button, or scroll the screen with 2 fingers.
Touch, hold and drag left/right with 3 fingers on the screen. \n \n * Some Android device might not support this feature.
Touch the desired screen or item directly to control.
Long tap to non-virtual mouse area and drag to the desired position.
Long tap to window\'s title bar and drag it to the desired position.
Long tap to non-virtual mouse area and drag
Select if you need more responsive control.
Select if work on multimedia, game, DirectX, CAD, etc.
Select if you need smoother and uninterrupted video play.
Change the remote PC\'s resolution. \nOriginal resolution will be restored after the session is ended.
Always change the resolution at start
Enter the command and tap Run.
Manage the power state of the vPro device with Intel (R) AMT.
Gateway PC to relay the command
This Agent does not support Viewer lock option. To use this option, switch Agent authentication to ID/PW authentication.
Access to KVM device is not available on mobile.
Screen lock is not available when connecting with virtual machines.
Connection is terminated due to unstable network. \nVerify 3G (LTE) or Wi-Fi status and try again.
Does not supports configuration on sub-monitor\'s resolution.
Remote connection will end to go to sign up page.
The network connection has been lost. Try connecting again.
Select the quality depending on the network.

Use of Wi-Fi is recommended as data size for video optimization using 3G/LTE connection might be larger than usual.


 i5 is the recommeded CPU for the remote PC.
2-factor authentication is required.\nLaunch the Google OTP app and enter the 6 digits OTP information.
Requires Google Authenticator for agent sign-in.\nLaunch the Google Authenticator app and enter the 6-digit verification number
To use Google Authenticator, go to rview.com on your PC, Preferences and click the Google Authenticator button on the 2-Step Verification screen to set up Google Authenticator
Are you new to Google OTP?
Enter your user credentials for accessing the remote PC\'s Windows Account.
You cannot connect to the device that you are on.
Out of service hours. Contact administrator.
Your password will expire today. \nFrom a PC browser, visit %1$s, log in and change the password.
Remote control agreement has been sent to the customer.\nConnection will be established after customer agrees to the request.
Request for Remote Explorer has been sent.\nRequest must be accepted to start using the service.
Request for Remote Explorer has been denied.
Connection has been cancelled for running in background for too long.
Response was not received from the server. Please, try again.
Entered Code for OTP authentication is invalid.
OTP Authentication is not configured. Contact the administrator.
File cannot be created/saved due to permission.\nChange the permission in the app\'s information.
Enter the Windows account credentials to access the remote system.
You have entered an incorrect ID or password. Remote explorer will shut down after 5 failed attempts.
This device uses email verification.\nRemote control will be available after registering your email on the PC.
Do you want to change your email address?
If you want to change your registered email address, please access rview.com site from your PC and register it in Preferences > My profile.
This device uses email verification.\nRemote control will be available after registering your email on the PC.
I have reviewed and agree to the contents (##LINK##).
Change the start time to be earlier than the end time.
Review the notes and warnings and check the box below to agree.
Do you want to delete this application?
Remote control request has been submitted.
Remote control is not available. \n Please, fill out and submit the application first.
Access request is waiting for approval.
Remote control will end in {%1$d} min.
Include administrator in case an approver is missing.
Change the access request time to less than %1$d hours.
Show the remote support notification. If this option is turned off, remote control might not work properly.
Failed to capture the remote screen.
Maximum number of quick menu reached.
Do you want to save the changes?

A good from of yours recommended "RemoteView" app.

Recommendation :
I recommend you "RemoteView", the best service to remotely control a PC from smart devices (Android phone / tablet, iPhone / iPad).

RemoteView is a service that allows you to connect and control a remote PC (Agent install required) with a smart device or PC anywhere, anytime.

Now, 3D games, CAD and even Photoshop are possible on your smart device With RemoteView.

Apply now for 14 day free trial.
#MAIL_HOME_URL#/Account/FreeTrial

■ Visit to RemoteView homepage. (#MAIL_HOME_URL#)
■ App download
     √  Android app (#ANDROID_DOWNLOAD_URL#)
     √  iPhone app (#IPHONE_DOWNLOAD_URL#)
     √  iPad app (#IPAD_DOWNLOAD_URL#)
■ Watch RemoteView Introduction (#VIDEO_URL#)
Viewer screen will be locked in 1 min \nas no activity was detected for %1$s min.
Viewer screen will be closed in 1 min \nas no activity was detected for %1$s min.
Service might be limited when log in IP and connecting IP are different following the security policy. Please, log back in to use the service.

Purchased license will expire on 
%s. 

Log in to the website from PC and extend it.
A verification code has been sent to the email address (%s).
Did you not receive the verification email?
1. Please, check your Spam or Trash folder.\n\n2. If the e-mail is not received after a period of time, try clicking the %s button.
Do you want to resend verification email?
You have entered an invalid 6-digit verification code.
Lock Viewer option is not available on this Agent. \n To use the option, change the Access authentication to ID/PW.

2-step verification via email is required to use the service. Update to the user's e-mail and authentication are available in the PC version.



Please, contact the administrator for more details.
